createdReminder: I will remind you <t:{{ time }}:R>: {{ reason }}.
invalidTime:
I couldn't understand your time format: `{{ input }}`.
You can use `d` for days, `h` for hours, `m` for minutes and `s` for seconds.
• `2h`: 2 hours.
• `15m`: 15 minutes.
• `3d 1h 30m`: 3 days, 1 hour and 30 minutes.
reminderDescription: You created a reminder <t:{{ time }}:R> for this moment.
